alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 5:13AM PST until December 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Stevens Pass and Holden Village. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Expect winter driving conditions across the mountains of western Chelan county, including Stevens Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of 1 inch per hour snowfall accumulations possible (50-55% chance) for several hours this afternoon at the Cascade Crest.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
